attributes.action: Remove the UN-ELECTED PM THERESA MAY due to vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details:
After she became Prime Minister, May's first speech espoused the left, with a promise to combat "burning injustice" and promising to be an advocate for the "ordinary working-class family" and not for the affluent in the UK. "The government I lead will be driven not by the interests of the privileged few but by yours. We will do everything we can to give you more control over your lives. ... When we take the big calls, we’ll think not of the powerful, but you"

Think Of US NOW...Just Quit!
attributes.background:
Despite the worldwide outrage at Trumps Muslim Ban, Theresa May continues to display her constant inability to listen to the British People
We now petition take a vote of NO CONFIDENCE & demand an immediate GENERAL ELECTION upon her dismal.
We need a leader that can stand up to Hatred & Bullies!
